name: Division of age
description:
Divides the age by two if it is greater than 18 and adds one day to the date in all cases.

If the age is less than 18 after the division, then a task is created with all the information.

name: Create task for TODO 1
description: Create a task with the information of TODO 1
body: return run("Division of age", name: todo.todo, age: todo.userId, date: __date__).evalResult
